member.name: T:Futureware.MantisConnect.Session
member.summary: Represents a connection session between the webservice client and server.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Session.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Net.NetworkCredential)
member.summary: Constructs a session given a url, username and password.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Session.Connect
member.summary: Connects to the webservice.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Session.Username
member.summary: User name specified on construction of the session.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Session.Password
member.summary: User password specified on construction of the session.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Session.Url
member.summary: MantisConnect webservice URL
member.remarks: eg: http://www.example.com/mantis/mantisconnect/mantisconnect.php

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Session.NetworkCredential
member.summary: Gets the network credential specified during construction time.
member.remarks: This is use to support connecting to Mantis installation that are protected with basic http authentication.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Session.Config
member.summary: Config object to be used to retrieve information about the configuration of the Mantis installation.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Session.Request
member.summary: Request is a wrapper around the MantisConnect webservice which makes calling the methods more natural for the rest of the C# code.

member.name: T:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request
member.summary: A wrapper around to provide a more friendly interface for the rest of the C# code.
member.remarks: Some methods will do do pre or post processing of data to convert them from the webservice format to one that is easier to access. For example, the webservice may return information about project ids/names as a serialised string, which then gets deserialised by this wrapper into a for easier access and binding to standard controls.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.#ctor(Futureware.MantisConnect.Session)
member.summary: Constructor
member.param: The session to use for all communication with the webservice. The user name and password are used from their to provide such details to the webservice with each call without exposing such detail to the user of the library.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.IssueAdd(Futureware.MantisConnect.Issue)
member.summary: Add the specified issue to Mantis database.
member.param: The issue details. Issue id is ignored.
member.remarks: TODO: Consider a generic and easy way to time operations.
member.returns: The id of the added issue

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.IssueDelete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Delete the issue with the specified id

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.IssueGet(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get information related to the specified issue id.
member.param: The id of the issue to retrieve information for.
member.returns: The issue details, this does not include related information in other tables, like issue notes, ...etc.
member.exception: The issue id is 0 or negative.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.IssueExists(System.Int32)
member.summary: Check if there exists an issue with the specified id.
member.param: Id of issue to check for.
member.returns: true: exists, false: does not exist
member.exception: The issue id is 0 or negative.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.IssueGetIdFromSummary(System.String)
member.summary: Search for an issue with the specified summary and return its issue id.
member.remarks: This is useful to allow a software which is automatically reporting issues due to exceptions or whatever reason to check first that the issue was not reported before. And if it was, then it knows the issue id and hence is able to add a note or do whatever with this id. Other applications may decide to delete the issue and create a new one, basically it is up to the client application to decide how to use the returned issue id.
member.exception: Summary field is empty or too long.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.IssueGetLastId(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the id of the last "reported" issue that is accessible to the logged in user.
member.remarks: This is useful for applications that need to know when new issues are being submitted to refresh a certain view or do something with such knowledge.
member.param: -1: default, 0: all projects, otherwise: project id
member.returns: 0: no issues accessible to logged in user, otherwise Id of the last reported issue.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.UserGetAccesibleProjects
member.summary: Get projects accessible to the currently logged in user.
member.remarks: This returns a table ("Projects") which includes two columns ("project_id", "name").

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.UserGetFilters(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the filters that are available to the current user and the specified project.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.GetIssues(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the issues based on the specified filter, page, and number per page.
member.param: Page number to get the issues for.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.ProjectGetCategories(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get categories defined for the project with the specified id.
member.remarks: TODO: Support CategoryData and Category.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.ProjectGetVersions(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get versions defined for the project with the specified id.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.ProjectGetVersionsReleased(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get released versions defined for the project with the specified id.
member.returns: An array of released project versions.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.ProjectGetVersionsUnreleased(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get unreleased versions defined for the project with the specified id.
member.returns: An array of released project versions.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.ConfigGet(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Get string value of the specified configuration option.
member.remarks:
If the caller attempts to retrieve sensitive configuration options like passwords, database name, ...etc, an exception will be raised.
TODO: Overload this method to get more types of configurations.
member.param: Name of configuration option (without the $g_ part)
An output parameter to hold the value of the configuration option
member.exception: config parameter is empty or blank.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.IssueNoteAdd(System.Int32,Futureware.MantisConnect.IssueNote)
member.summary: Adds a note to the specified issue.
member.param: Issue id to add note to.
member.remarks: The user must have write access to the issue and the issue must not be readonly.
member.exception: The issue id is 0 or negative. Or note is empty or blank.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.IssueNoteDelete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Delete the issue note with the specified id
member.param: Id of issue note to delete
member.exception: The issue note id is 0 or negative.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.ValidateProjectId(System.Int32)
member.summary: Validates a project id and raises an exception if it is not valid.
member.exception: The project id is smaller than -1.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.ValidateIssueId(System.Int32)
member.summary: Validates an issue id and raises an exception if it is not valid.
member.exception: The issue id is 0 or negative.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.ValidateIssueNoteId(System.Int32)
member.summary: Validates an issue note id and raises an exception if it is not valid.
member.exception: The issue note id is 0 or negative.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.ValidateIssueNote(Futureware.MantisConnect.IssueNote)
member.summary: Validates an issue note and raises an exception if it is not valid.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Request.ValidateConfigName(System.String)
member.summary: Validates the name of a configuration option and raises an exception if it is not valid.

member.summary: Session to retrieve the user name / password of the current session from.

member.summary: Webservice auto-generated proxy.

member.name: T:Futureware.MantisConnect.MantisEnum
member.summary: A class to handle enumerations that are defined in Mantis.
member.remarks: The format of Mantis enumerations is as follows: "10:viewer,25:reporter,40:updater,55:developer,70:manager,90:administrator"

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.MantisEnum.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructor

member.name: F:Futureware.MantisConnect.MantisEnum.enumeration
member.summary: The enumeration string supplied at construction time.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.MantisEnum.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Given an id, this indexer returns the corresponding enumeration name.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.MantisEnum.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Given a name, this indexer returns the corresponding enumeration id.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.MantisEnum.Labels
member.summary: Returns an array of strings containing the labels in the enumerations.

member.name: T:Futureware.MantisConnect.Config
member.summary: Provides access to Mantis configuration.
member.remarks:
This is useful to provide access to Mantis configuration like enumerations and any other configs that are not considered private. Using this class the client will not be able to retrieve sensitive information from the webservice, like passwords, database names, host names, ...etc.
This class also provides the necessary caching to avoid unnecessary round trips to the server. Caching is feasible in this class due to the static nature of these configs.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Config.#ctor(Futureware.MantisConnect.Session)
member.summary: Constructor
member.param: Session to be used to retrieve the configs.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Config.Get(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Gets the value associated with a configuration variable of type string.
member.param: The name of the configuration variable to get.
The output parameter to store the config variable in. This is a parameter rather than a return value to allow overloading of this method for different types.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Config.Get(System.String,Futureware.MantisConnect.MantisEnum@)
member.summary: Get the enumeration with the specified name.
member.remarks: See also the properties for the enumerations.
member.param: An output parameter to contain the created instance.

member.name: F:Futureware.MantisConnect.Config.configs
member.summary: Hashtable of cached configuration options.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Config.Session
member.summary: Returns a reference to the instance used to access MantisConnect webservice.

member.summary: Access Level Enumeration

member.name: T:Futureware.MantisConnect.Issue
member.summary: A class to contain all information related to an issue record.
member.remarks: This class does not contain information like issue notes, attachments, ...etc which is stored in different tables in Mantis database.

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Issue.#ctor
member.summary: Default Constructor

member.name: M:Futureware.MantisConnect.Issue.ToString
member.summary: Dumps the issue information to a string.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Issue.Id
member.summary: Issue Id
member.value: A value greater than or equal to 0.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Issue.Project
member.summary: Project to which this issue belongs. Null means un-assigned yet.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Issue.Category
member.summary: Name of category to which the issue belongs. This field is mandatory.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Issue.Summary
member.summary: Summary of the issue. This field is mandatory.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Issue.Description
member.summary: Description of the issue. This field is mandatory.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Issue.StepsToReproduce
member.summary: Steps to reproduce the issue.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Issue.AdditionalInformation
member.summary: Additional information about the issue.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Issue.AssignedTo
member.summary: Id of user handling the issue.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Issue.ReportedBy
member.summary: Id of user who reported the issue.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Issue.ProductVersion
member.summary: Product version

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Issue.ProductBuild
member.summary: Product build

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Issue.Os
member.summary: Operating System

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Issue.OsBuild
member.summary: Operating System Build

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Issue.Platform
member.summary: Platform (eg: i386)

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Issue.FixedInVersion
member.summary: Fixed in version field.
member.value: Has to be the name of a version that is defined for the project to which this issue is being added.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Issue.SponsorshipTotal
member.summary: Total sponsorships for this issue.
member.remarks: This field is usually populated when information is retrieved about an issue.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Issue.Reproducibility
member.summary: Issue Reproducibility (eg: always, random, not tried, N/A, ...etc)
member.remarks: This matches the ids defined in the reproducibility enumeration in Mantis configuration file.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Issue.Resolution
member.summary: Issue Resolution (eg: fixed, duplicate, not an issue)
member.remarks: This matches the ids defined in the resolution enumeration in Mantis configuration file.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Issue.Eta
member.summary: Estimated Time of Arrival
member.remarks: This matches the ids defined in the eta enumeration in Mantis configuration file.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Issue.Status
member.summary: Issue status
member.remarks: This matches the ids defined in the status enumeration in Mantis configuration file.

member.summary: Issue Priority
member.remarks: This matches the ids defined in the priority enumeration in Mantis configuration file.

member.name: P:Futureware.MantisConnect.Issue.Severity
member.summary: Issue Severity
member.remarks: This matches the ids defined in the severity enumeration in Mantis configuration file.

member.summary: Projection for the scope of the work associated with resolving the issue.
